branchCategory.name: Integrated Display
branchCategory.description: <p>Sensors with buttons and a display to set and read values from an operator's position.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE20C(F), Digital Vacuum Sensor, 3 Screen 2 Output + Analog, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>ZSE20C(F) is a digital vacuum sensor offering compatibility with both compressed air and non-corrosive liquids.  Compared to the ZSE20, ZSE20C(F) adds a 2nd switch output, as well as analog voltage or current output.  The 3-screen, 3-color display shows the instantaneous reading in red or green, and the setting label and its numerical value in orange.  The switch output responds within 1.5ms once the set pressure value is reached.  Both vacuum and compuond pressure ranges are offered.  ZSE20C(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE80(F), Digital Vacuum Sensor, 1 Screen, 2 Output + Analog, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>ZSE80(F) is a digital vacuum sensor with a 4 digit, 2 color display, compatible with compressed air and non-corrosive liquids.&nbsp; Instantaneous readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition.&nbsp; Switch outputs are also indicated on the display.&nbsp; Other functions include security, power saving, resolution and stability.&nbsp; Piping directions can be rear or bottom, with VCR<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&reg; and Swagelok</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&reg; fittings available.&nbsp; Both vacuum and compound pressure ranges are offered.&nbsp; ZSE80(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #ff0000;">The ISE80(F) legacy pressure sensor has been updated.&nbsp; Please consider the new ISE20C.&nbsp; Improved features include a new 3-screen, 3-color display and 2 switch outputs plus analog output.</span></p>
